publishers.name: BetterGov.PH
publishers.description: A volunteer-led tech initiative committed to creating #civictech projects aimed at making government more transparent, efficient, and accessible to citizens.

publishers.name: Open Source Software PH
publishers.description: A developer-led initiative to grow the community of developers building open source software across the Philippines.

datasets.name: Flood Control Projects Dashboard data
datasets.description: The data for BetterGov.PH flood control projects dashboard, which visualizes flood control infrastructure projects across the philippines.

resources.name: Flood Control JSON data
resources.description: The main data source containing detailed information about flood control projects.

datasets.name: Ateneo Policy Center (APC) Political Dynasties Dataset
datasets.description: The Ateneo Policy Center (APC) Political Dynasties Dataset is a continuing effort to track leadership patterns at the local government level in the Republic of the Philippines. In particular, it traces the presence and extent of political clans, comprised of elected politicians with family members also in elected office prior to or during their term in office. In the economic development literature, very few studies contain empirical estimates of dynastic patterns at the local government level.

resources.name: Ateneo Policy Center (APC) Political Dynasties Dataset
resources.description: The Ateneo Policy Center (APC) Political Dynasties Dataset is a continuing effort to track leadership patterns at the local government level in the Republic of the Philippines. In particular, it traces the presence and extent of political clans, comprised of elected politicians with family members also in elected office prior to or during their term in office. In the economic development literature, very few studies contain empirical estimates of dynastic patterns at the local government level.

datasets.name: Open PhilGEPS Data
datasets.description: The data for BetterGov.PH Open PhilGEPS project, which is a comprehensive, open-source government procurement analytics dashboard for the Philippines Government Electronic Procurement System (PhilGEPS).

resources.name: Open PhilGEPS Data
resources.description: Optimized Parquet files for high-performance analytics and search operations in the PhilGEPS Dashboard with the following aggregations and analytics: Geographic Areas, Business Categories, Contractors/Suppliers, Government Organizations along with complete contract and a search-optimized variant.

datasets.name: Raw Philippine Data
datasets.description: Raw data about Philippine politicians, public officials, and legislative documents collected from various sources. The data is intended for research, analysis, and civic technology purposes.

resources.name: persons
resources.description: 45,424 person records of Philippine politicians and public officials with ID, first name, last name, name suffix (if applicable).

resources.name: memberships
resources.description: Political party affiliations and positions held by persons, including  ID, person ID, party, region, province, locality, position, year.

datasets.name: Philippines GeoJSON Data
datasets.description: Open source GeoJSON data formats for the Philippines, providing accurate province and regional boundaries for mapping.
